scripts.build: npx tailwindcss -i ./css/navbar.css -o ./dist/output-navbar.css --watch && npx tailwindcss -i ./css/info.css -o ./dist/output-info.css --watch && npx tailwindcss -i ./css/loading.css -o ./dist/output-loading.css --watch  && npx tailwindcss -i ./css/carousel.css -o ./dist/output-carousel.css --watch
